home.name: Murilo Rocha
home.nameDescription: Fullstack Developer building end-to-end solutions using

works.title: SMV Zap
works.description: Landing page built with Next.js for a WhatsApp extension featuring a CRM and message broadcasting system. Both the extension (developed in React with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn) and the backend (built with Node.js) were projects I worked on within the same company.

works.title: Bloch Sphere
works.description: Interactive 3D Bloch Sphere built with React and React Three Fiber for a college project, running in the browser. Users can manipulate qubit state parameters and instantly visualize the corresponding quantum-state formula and its computed results.

works.title: Olhaozap.AI
works.description: Website that shortens WhatsApp links for free, built with Next.js and Next Server Actions.

works.title: Wombo Combo Rush
works.description: A fully self-made game developed for a college game jam, built with C# and the Unity engine, and playable directly in the web browser.

works.title: DeRot
works.description: Chrome extension built with React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS. It reminds users when they are endlessly scrolling vertical videos on social platforms by showing a small math-based captcha interruption.

works.title: TAMJ — Procedural
works.description: This project is an infinite terrain generation simulator built in Unity using C#. It features asynchronous chunk generation powered by cellular automata and multi-octave Perlin noise.

Habilities.MainText: I focus on creating solid application structures, designing scalable and reliable systems that support long-term growth and clean development practices.
Using modern technologies like Node.js, NestJS and Go, I build efficient APIs, secure infrastructures and maintainable server-side logic.
I develop responsive and high-performance interfaces using React, Next.js and modern tooling, ensuring smooth interactions and consistent user experiences.

home.SparkMensage: I work with agile practices like Scrum and sprint planning to keep projects organized and moving efficiently.

about.aboutMe: I’m a Brazilian programmer who has worked with a wide range of technologies, from Arduino and prototyping to web development. I enjoy creating games as a hobby and currently work as a full-stack developer.
about.history: I love to stay busy with my hobbies. I enjoy playing the guitar and listening to music, and I'm also a big fan of video games. To unwind and disconnect from the digital world, I like to run, spend time at the beach, and practice meditation for mindfulness and relaxation.
about.history2: I have a passion for learning a bit of everything, from Arduino automation and machining to studying new languages like Italian.
about.anotherInspirationsTitle: My stack is focused on a full-cycle development workflow, working with Node.js, NestJS, Next.js, and other modern technologies. I’m constantly learning new tools and approaches to keep up with the fast-changing tech landscape.
about.anotherInspirationsText: Every time I start a new project, I try to apply what I learned from past mistakes so I don’t repeat them. I tend to be somewhat perfectionist, which can slow me down at times

contact.title: Contact
contact.subTitle: Interested in working together? Send me a message.
contact.promtForGem: Take on the presence of an ancient sage and generate only one poetic line in quotation marks, renewing tone and symbolism with every output.

footer.ReachText: Feel free to get in touch at
